name: Sonya Garber
coverLetter: I've just started trimming and have a lot to learn, but I am a quick learner and enthusiastic to start. I can start anytime and would like to work with a team that has experience so that I have a mentor to teach me and help me if I'm stuck. My fiancee Brandon Halberg is also applying and it would be easier to work with him since we do carpool.
